content.scenario: Quick-fire round! Answer true or false to these sanitation statements.
content.connection: These common misconceptions trip up many professionals. Master these and you'll never make these mistakes.
content.law: Based on TDLR ยง83.100 health and safety definitions.

quiz.question: A UV sanitizer can be used to disinfect implements that have visible debris on them.
quiz.explanation: FALSE. UV sanitizers are ONLY for storing already-cleaned implements. They cannot disinfect dirty tools.

quiz.question: Cleaning and disinfecting are the same thing.
quiz.explanation: FALSE. Cleaning removes debris. Disinfecting kills pathogens. Both steps are required.

quiz.question: All implements must be cleaned before they can be disinfected.
quiz.explanation: TRUE. Debris can prevent disinfectants from reaching and killing pathogens.
